original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): The Met Department said that the prevailing showery condition over the island is expected to continue further during the next few days as well.
Showers or thundershowers will occur over most parts of the island after 1.00 pm.
Showers may occur in coastal areas of Western and Southern provinces and in Jaffna, Kilinochchi, Mannar, and Puttalam districts during the morning too.
Fairly heavy showers of about 100 mm are likely at some places in Eastern and Uva provinces and in Polonnaruwa district. Fairly heavy showers above 75 mm are likely elsewhere over the island.
700 dengue cases recorded in three days; Dengue High Risk Zones declared
Draft bill on National Policy Commission to be tabled in parliament soon by Sub-Committee led by Namal
